revision.text:
'''Eggs''' are items that contain Pokémon. Eggs can be obtained in several ways: buying them from [[Shops]], [[Pokémon Day Care|breeding]] level 100 Pokémon or in some [[Dungeons]] loot. Hatching an egg will boost the bred Pokémon's attack by 25% of its base attack. Where you buy / obtain an egg has zero effect on the pokemon Hatched from that egg. == [[Shops|Shop]] Egg Pool == In the following tables, '''Bolded''' names indicate Pokémon that can be obtained in their respective regions by either hatching shop eggs or through [[Berries#Wandering_Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]] on the [[Farm]]. '''''Bolded and Italicized''''' names indicate Pokémon that can only be obtained in their respective region by hatching shop eggs. '''''Bold, Italicized, and underlined''''' names indicate Pokémon that cannot be obtained outside shop eggs (ie can't find it wild in a later region even with Require Complete Pokédex challenge off) as of v0.8.15 The Egg Pool split works like this: * 50% chance of getting a Pokemon from the furthest region you've been to (odds split evenly for each possible Pokemon from the furthest region reached) * Remaining 50% is divided into an equal split among all previous region egg pool Pokemon. === '''[[Kanto]]''' === {| class="wikitable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Charmander_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Charmander.png|50px]] '''Charmander''' || [[File:Bulbasaur_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Bulbasaur.png|50px]] '''Bulbasaur''' || [[File:Squirtle_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Squirtle.png|50px]] '''Squirtle''' || [[File:Magnemite_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Magnemite.png|50px]] Magnemite || [[File:Hitmonchan_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Hitmonchan.png|50px]] '''''Hitmonchan''''' || [[File:Dratini_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Dratini.png|50px]] '''''Dratini''''' |- | [[File:Growlithe_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Growlithe.png|50px]] Growlithe || [[File:Oddish_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Oddish.png|50px]] Oddish || [[File:Lapras_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Lapras.png|50px]] '''''Lapras''''' || [[File:Pikachu_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Pikachu.png|50px]] Pikachu || [[File:Hitmonlee_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Hitmonlee.png|50px]] '''''Hitmonlee''''' || [[File:Dragonair_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Dragonair.png|50px]] Dragonair |- | [[File:Ponyta_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Ponyta.png|50px]] Ponyta || [[File:Bellsprout_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Bellsprout.png|50px]] Bellsprout || [[File:Staryu_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Staryu.png|50px]] Staryu || [[File:Voltorb_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Voltorb.png|50px]] Voltorb || [[File:Machop_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Machop.png|50px]] Machop || [[File:Dragonite_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Dragonite.png|50px]] Dragonite |- | [[File:Vulpix_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Vulpix.png|50px]] Vulpix || [[File:Tangela_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Tangela.png|50px]] Tangela || [[File:Psyduck_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Psyduck.png|50px]] Psyduck || [[File:Electabuzz_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Electabuzz.png|50px]] Electabuzz || [[File:Mankey_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Mankey.png|50px]] Mankey ||
--- |} === '''[[Johto]]''' === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! --- || [[File:Tropius_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Tropius.png|50px]] Tropius || [[File:Clamperl_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Clamperl.png|50px]] Clamperl || [[File:Minun_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Minun.png|50px]] Minun ||

[[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Tepig_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Tepig.png|50px]] '''Tepig''' || [[File:Snivy_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Snivy.png|50px]] '''Snivy''' || [[File:Oshawott_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Oshawott.png|50px]] '''Oshawott''' || [[File:Blitzle_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Blitzle.png|50px]] '''''Blitzle''''' || [[File:Throh_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Throh.png|50px]] '''''Throh''''' || [[File:Deino_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Deino.png|50px]] '''''Deino''''' |- | [[File:Pansear_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Pansear.png|50px]] '''''Pansear''''' || [[File:Pansage_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Pansage.png|50px]] '''''Pansage''''' || [[File:Panpour_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Panpour.png|50px]] '''''Panpour''''' ||

[[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Litten_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Litten.png|50px]] '''Litten''' || [[File:Rowlet_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Rowlet.png|50px]] '''Rowlet''' || [[File:Popplio_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Popplio.png|50px]] '''Popplio''' ||
--- || [[File:Crabrawler_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Crabrawler.png|50px]] '''''Crabrawler''''' || [[File:Turtonator_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Turtonator.png|50px]] '''''Turtonator''''' |- |
--- || [[File:Morelull_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Morelull.png|50px]] '''''Morelull''''' || [[File:Wimpod_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Wimpod.png|50px]] '''''Wimpod''''' ||
--- ||
--- || [[File:Drampa_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Drampa.png|50px]] '''''Drampa''''' |- |
--- ||
--- ||
--- ||
--- ||
--- || [[File:Jangmo-o_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Jangmo-o.png|50px]] Jangmo-o |- |
--- ||
--- ||
--- ||
--- ||
--- || [[File:Hakamo-o_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Hakamo-o.png|50px]] Hakamo-o |- |
--- ||
--- ||
--- ||
--- ||
--- || [[File:Kommo-o_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Kommo-o.png|50px]] Kommo-o |} ==Helpful Info== When you enter the next area the Pokémon rates change. Assuming you've just entered [[Sinnoh]] the [[Water Egg]] table changes from ===In [[Hoenn]]=== (Squirtle, Lapras, Staryu, Psyduck) (Totodile, Wooper, Marill, Qwilfish) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) ===In [[Sinnoh]]=== (Squirtle, Lapras, Staryu, Psyduck) (Totodile, Wooper, Marill, Qwilfish) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) This makes the chance of getting a Pokémon from the new region you entered 50% and dropping the total combination of all previous areas percent's down to 50%. The Mystery Egg will pull randomly from all egg pools, making it most useful when you have not obtained any egg Pokémon for that region yet. {{Eggs}}
[[Category:Eggs]]
revision.comment: Clarified that location bought doesn't affect anything

revision.text:
'''Eggs''' are items that contain Pokémon. Eggs can be obtained in several ways: buying them from [[Shops]], [[Pokémon Day Care|breeding]] level 100 Pokémon or in some [[Dungeons]] loot. Hatching an egg will boost the bred Pokémon's attack by 25% of its base attack. == [[Shops|Shop]] Egg Pool == In the following tables, '''Bolded''' names indicate Pokémon that can be obtained in their respective regions by either hatching shop eggs or through [[Berries#Wandering_Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]] on the [[Farm]]. '''''Bolded and Italicized''''' names indicate Pokémon that can only be obtained in their respective region by hatching shop eggs. '''''Bold, Italicized, and underlined''''' names indicate Pokémon that cannot be obtained outside shop eggs (ie can't find it wild in a later region even with Require Complete Pokédex challenge off) as of v0.8.15 The Egg Pool split works like this: * 50% chance of getting a Pokemon from the furthest region you've been to (odds split evenly for each possible Pokemon from the furthest region reached) * Remaining 50% is divided into an equal split among all previous region egg pool Pokemon. === '''[[Kanto]]''' === {| class="wikitable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Charmander_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Charmander.png|50px]] '''Charmander''' || [[File:Bulbasaur_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Bulbasaur.png|50px]] '''Bulbasaur''' || [[File:Squirtle_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Squirtle.png|50px]] '''Squirtle''' || [[File:Magnemite_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Magnemite.png|50px]] Magnemite || [[File:Hitmonchan_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Hitmonchan.png|50px]] '''''Hitmonchan''''' || [[File:Dratini_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Dratini.png|50px]] '''''Dratini''''' |- | [[File:Growlithe_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Growlithe.png|50px]] Growlithe || [[File:Oddish_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Oddish.png|50px]] Oddish || [[File:Lapras_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Lapras.png|50px]] '''''Lapras''''' || [[File:Pikachu_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Pikachu.png|50px]] Pikachu || [[File:Hitmonlee_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Hitmonlee.png|50px]] '''''Hitmonlee''''' || [[File:Dragonair_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Dragonair.png|50px]] Dragonair |- | [[File:Ponyta_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Ponyta.png|50px]] Ponyta || [[File:Bellsprout_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Bellsprout.png|50px]] Bellsprout || [[File:Staryu_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Staryu.png|50px]] Staryu || [[File:Voltorb_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Voltorb.png|50px]] Voltorb || [[File:Machop_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Machop.png|50px]] Machop || [[File:Dragonite_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Dragonite.png|50px]] Dragonite |- | [[File:Vulpix_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Vulpix.png|50px]] Vulpix || [[File:Tangela_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Tangela.png|50px]] Tangela || [[File:Psyduck_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Psyduck.png|50px]] Psyduck || [[File:Electabuzz_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Electabuzz.png|50px]] Electabuzz || [[File:Mankey_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Mankey.png|50px]] Mankey ||

--- || [[File:Kommo-o_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Kommo-o.png|50px]] Kommo-o |} ==Helpful Info== When you enter the next area the Pokémon rates change. Assuming you've just entered [[Sinnoh]] the [[Water Egg]] table changes from ===In [[Hoenn]]=== (Squirtle, Lapras, Staryu, Psyduck) (Totodile, Wooper, Marill, Qwilfish) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) ===In [[Sinnoh]]=== (Squirtle, Lapras, Staryu, Psyduck) (Totodile, Wooper, Marill, Qwilfish) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Mudkip, Feebas, Clamperl) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) (Piplup, Finneon, Buizel) This makes the chance of getting a Pokémon from the new region you entered 50% and dropping the total combination of all previous areas percent's down to 50%. The Mystery Egg will pull randomly from all egg pools, making it most useful when you have not obtained any egg Pokémon for that region yet. {{Eggs}}
[[Category:Eggs]]
revision.comment: /* Shop Egg Pool */Clarification of egg pool

revision.text:
'''Eggs''' are items that contain Pokémon. Eggs can be obtained in several ways: buying them from [[Shops]], [[Pokémon Day Care|breeding]] level 100 Pokémon or in some [[Dungeons]] loot. Hatching an egg will boost the bred Pokémon's attack by 25% of its base attack. == [[Shops|Shop]] Egg Pool == In the following tables, '''Bolded''' names indicate Pokémon that can be obtained in their respective regions by either hatching shop eggs or through [[Berries#Wandering_Pokémon|Wandering Pokémon]] on the [[Farm]]. '''''Bolded and Italicized''''' names indicate Pokémon that can only be obtained in their respective region by hatching shop eggs. '''''Bold, Italicized, and underlined''''' names indicate Pokémon that cannot be obtained outside shop eggs (ie can't find it wild in a later region even with Require Complete Pokédex challenge off) as of v0.8.15 The Egg Pool split works like this: * 50% chance of getting a Pokemon from the current region (odds split evenly for each possible Pokemon from the current region) * Remaining 50% is divided into an equal split among all previous region egg pool Pokemon. === '''[[Kanto]]''' === {| class="wikitable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Charmander_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Charmander.png|50px]] '''Charmander''' || [[File:Bulbasaur_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Bulbasaur.png|50px]] '''Bulbasaur''' || [[File:Squirtle_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Squirtle.png|50px]] '''Squirtle''' || [[File:Magnemite_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Magnemite.png|50px]] Magnemite || [[File:Hitmonchan_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Hitmonchan.png|50px]] '''''Hitmonchan''''' || [[File:Dratini_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Dratini.png|50px]] '''''Dratini''''' |- | [[File:Growlithe_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Growlithe.png|50px]] Growlithe || [[File:Oddish_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Oddish.png|50px]] Oddish || [[File:Lapras_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Lapras.png|50px]] '''''Lapras''''' || [[File:Pikachu_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Pikachu.png|50px]] Pikachu || [[File:Hitmonlee_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Hitmonlee.png|50px]] '''''Hitmonlee''''' || [[File:Dragonair_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Dragonair.png|50px]] Dragonair |- | [[File:Ponyta_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Ponyta.png|50px]] Ponyta || [[File:Bellsprout_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Bellsprout.png|50px]] Bellsprout || [[File:Staryu_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Staryu.png|50px]] Staryu || [[File:Voltorb_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Voltorb.png|50px]] Voltorb || [[File:Machop_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Machop.png|50px]] Machop || [[File:Dragonite_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Dragonite.png|50px]] Dragonite |- | [[File:Vulpix_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Vulpix.png|50px]] Vulpix || [[File:Tangela_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Tangela.png|50px]] Tangela || [[File:Psyduck_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Psyduck.png|50px]] Psyduck || [[File:Electabuzz_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Electabuzz.png|50px]] Electabuzz || [[File:Mankey_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Mankey.png|50px]] Mankey ||
--- |} === '''[[Johto]]''' === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! [[Fire Egg|Fire]] !! [[Grass Egg|Grass]] !! [[Water Egg|Water]] !! [[Electric Egg|Electric]] !! [[Fighting Egg|Fighting]] !! [[Dragon Egg|Dragon]] |- | [[File:Cyndaquil_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Cyndaquil.png|50px]] '''Cyndaquil''' || [[File:Chikorita_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Chikorita.png|50px]] '''Chikorita''' || [[File:Totodile_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Totodile.png|50px]] '''Totodile''' || [[File:Chinchou_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Chinchou.png|50px]] Chinchou || [[File:Tyrogue_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] /[[File:Tyrogue.png|50px]] Tyrogue ||
